tārā cakra ādhāra yugam naṭī iti padam uddharet
kūrca traya lajjā antaḥ yam kathitaḥ nartakī manuḥ
phulla indīvara sundara ambara mukhīm uttuṅga kumbha stanīm
khelat khañjana yugma mīna nayanām ānanda dāyi smitām
kṣīra ambhonidhi kūla vandi vanitām ānīla vāsa āsanīm
candra udyat sunakha ādinīm maṇi kula vyāhāra kāra uttarām
nīca gām aṅganām gatvā sapta aham japa pūjane
kṛtvā arka astamane dhūpam candanena japet api
kāma bhoga pradātrī sā bhāryā bhavati nartakī
suvarṇa palam ekam tu vyaya artham tyajya gacchati

original: dine dine naṭī devī sthāyinī bhavati dhruvam |
analyzed: dine dine naṭī devī sthāyinī bhavati dhruvam
tārakūrca dvayam ca astra dvayam ceṭī tatas param
tatas krodha dvayam dattvā ceṭī mantra uttamaḥ mataḥ

original: (oṃ hū/ hū/ phaṭ phaṭ ceṭī hū/ hū/)
analyzed: om hū hū phaṭ phaṭ ceṭī hū hū
gacchantī mita bhāṣiṇī śaśi mukhī bhraṣṭa uttarīya ambarā
bibhrantī kalaśam sarojam amalam svarṇa anta sīmantinī
kiñcid vakra samācitā api kavarī pāyāt ciram ceṭikā
kutra api bhīṣaṇa sthāne nāma uccāraṇa mātrataḥ
dhruvam ceṭi samāgatya ceṭī karma karoti api

original: athavā svagṛhadvāre tryahaṃ rātrau japaṃ caret |
analyzed: athavā sva gṛha dvāre tri aham rātrau japam caret

original: āgatya nilayaṃ devī ceṭīkarma karoti sā || 21/42 ||
analyzed: āgatya nilayam devī ceṭī karma karoti sā
tārakūrca asta yugmam tu kāmeśvarī bhūti nyataḥ
ante krodha dvayam kāmeśvarī mantraḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: (oṃ hū/ phaṭ phaṭ kāmeśvarī bhūtinyai hū/ hū/)
analyzed: om hū phaṭ phaṭ kāmeśvarī bhūtinyai hū hū
kāmam yuddha samāgatā madhura tā vāsanta puṣpa anvitā
gāyantī madhura svarā smita mukhī vīṇāvatī cañcalā
rakta ambhoja vilocanā madhu madaiḥ yuktā samantāt iyam
pāyāt puṣpadhanuḥ dharā madhumukhī kāmeśvarī bhūtinī
mātṛ sthānam samāgatya kṛtvā māṃsasya bhakṣaṇam
māṃsa ādīni balim dattvā sahasram sapta vāsarān
japet niyatam ayāti rudhira arghyam nivedayet
kāmeśvarī bhavet tuṣṭā bhāryā bhavati kāmitā
sarvāḥ āśāḥ pūrayati eva rājyam yacchati niścitam
tāram lajjām ca kūrca astra dvayam uktvā ratipriye

original: (oṃ hū/ phaṭ phaṭ ratipriye hū/ hū/ phaṭ)
analyzed: om hū phaṭ phaṭ ratipriye hū hū phaṭ
hema prākāra madhye sura viṭapi tale hema pīṭha adhirūḍhā
yakṣī bālā visarpat parimala kusuma udbhāsi dhamilla bhārā
pīna uttuṅga stana āḍhyā kuvalaya nayanā rakta varṇā karābhyām
bhrāmyat rakta utpala ābhā sakala sura natā divya bhūṣā aṅgahārā
krodha dvaya astra yugataḥ devī iti padam uddharet
ante krodha dvayam gṛhya devī mantram anuttamam

original: (hū/ hū/ phaṭ phaṭ devi hū/ hū/)
analyzed: hū hū phaṭ phaṭ devi hū hū
sarva alaṅkāra saṃyuktā bhāryā bhavati kāmitā  /

original: rātrau devagṛhaṃ gatvā tatra śayyāṃ prakalpayet |
analyzed: rātrau devagṛham gatvā tatra śayyām prakalpayet
sita vastram candanam ca jātī puṣpam pradāpayet
dhūpam ca guggulam kṛtvā sahasram prajapet manum
japa ante niyatā āyāti cumbana āliṅgana ādibhiḥ
kāmitā bhava bhāryā iyam satyam deva aṅga nāyikā
dadāti aṣṭau dināni ante divyam vastra yugam tatas
kāmikam bhojanam divyam parivārasya dāsyati
anyat ca vaiśravaṇa gṛhāt dravyam ānīya yacchati
etat japtvā sahasrāṇi japa ante sidhyati dhruvam
muhur muhur japet mantram iti āha krodhabhūpatiḥ
phetkāriṇītantre iyam mayā uktā kṛtyā samasta āgama sāra bhūtā

original: śatrorvināśāya ghanāya samyak sadbhiḥsadeyaṃ niyataṃ niyojyā || 21/56 ||
